snippet.title: Project X Zone 2 - 3DS - Cross over once again! (English Announcement Trailer)
snippet.description:
Bandai Namco Entertainment, Capcom and Sega are back with Project X Zone 2 for Nintendo 3DS this Autumn 2015! Get ready once again to dive into this tactical-RPG with a massive and unique lineup of characters from so many game series. It’s the ultimate cross-over! 

Like us: https://www.facebook.com/bandainamcogames.europe
Follow us: https://twitter.com/Bandainamcoeu
Visit us: https://www.bandainamcogames.eu and talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.bandainamcogames.eu/community
